post.text: I am in New York City - watching history unfold. This is a MOVEMENT to MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN! I love the United States of America - and am forever grateful for your support!

comment.author: Ian
comment.text: Mate!!! after all the thousands and millions of $$$$$ you've spent on your run for office I can't believe you can't afford someone with more imagination and creativeness to write yours and YOUR WIFE'S Speech, I you become president and that's a BIG, IF I hope you're wife doesn't continue to plagiarize speeches from Michelle Obama. From Australian, Western Australia

replies.author: Benjamin
replies.text: First of all...research. Michelle Obama wasn't the first to say those words, either.

replies.author: Tiffany
replies.text: Tammy "research". Well aren't you just so intellectually superior! Haley.....super intelligent retort there. Perhaps you could ask Professor Tammy the Google researcher for some tips on how to retort without looking like a moron.
